json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="containerIds">
<prop type="array" name="zones">
<prop type="array" name="hyperVHosts">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="agentDetails">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="disks">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="dras">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@HealthError_read>" name="healthErrors">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="marsAgents">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@HealthError_read>" name="healthErrors">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="processServers">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="healthErrors">
<prop type="array" name="innerHealthErrors">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="ipAddresses">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="pushInstallers">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@HealthError_read>" name="healthErrors">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="rcmProxies">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@HealthError_read>" name="healthErrors">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="replicationAgents">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@HealthError_read>" name="healthErrors">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="reprotectAgents">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="accessibleDatastores">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@HealthError_read>" name="healthErrors">
<prop type="array" name="masterTargetServers">
<prop type="array" name="dataStores">
<prop type="array<@HealthError_read>" name="healthErrors">
<prop type="array" name="retentionVolumes">
<prop type="array<@HealthError_read>" name="validationErrors">
<prop type="array" name="processServers">
<prop type="array<@HealthError_read>" name="healthErrors">
<prop type="array" name="mobilityServiceUpdates">
<prop type="array" name="runAsAccounts">
<prop type="array" name="switchProviderBlockingErrorDetails">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@ProcessServerDetails_read>" name="processServers">
<prop type="array<@HealthError_read>" name="healthErrorDetails">

The ARM Id of the physical site.
The identity provider input for source agent authentication.
The base authority for Azure Active Directory authentication.
The application/client Id for the service principal with which the on-premise management/data plane components would communicate with our Azure services.
